release.action: Added super class for test cases, DefaultTCase, which verifies that all helpers have been destroyed.

Translated ControlledThread to English and made some minor documentation / formatting improvements. Translated documentation of TestPropertiesDefinition. Translated the documentation of ThreadFlag and removed some compilation warnings.
Added a class (PictureBuilder) that generates random pictures.
Added a class to obtain the contents of a web page (WebGetter).
Added a method to RandomGenerator to obtain a random item from an array.
Corrected a bug which made creating a random picture would sometime fail with an assertion error.
Added a method to pick a random value from a collection.
Updated RandomGenerator methods to use IllegalArgumentException in case of incorrect parameters (instead of using asserts).
Added support for the TestHelper annotation.
Translated the documentation of the CommandRunner and removed a compilation warning. Made some corrections to remove findbugs warnings.
Added support for Eclipse and maven PMD. Configured PMD ruleset file and cleaned all errors related to PMD.
